org.cleartk.classifier.mallet
Class MalletDataWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.cleartk.classifier.DataWriter_ImplBase<String,String,List<NameNumber>>
      org.cleartk.classifier.mallet.MalletDataWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataWriter<String>
public class MalletDataWriter
extends DataWriter_ImplBase<String,String,List<NameNumber>>


Copyright (c) 2007-2008, Regents of the University of Colorado
All rights reserved. This training data consumer produces training data suitable for Mallet Conditional Random Field (CRF) tagger. Each line of the training data contains a string representation of each feature followed by the label/result for that instance.

Author:
Philip Ogren
